This NuGet package must be compiled and configured for x86 platforms.
Open the configuration manager dialog and set your project platform to x86.
You can also download the x64 assemblies version from NuGet:
    Install-Package ImageComponents.Core.Imaging-X64

Examples:
https://www.imagecomponents.net/QuickStarts/Index/5

Dependencies:
Microsoft Visual C++ Visual Studio 2015
X64
https://download.microsoft.com/download/9/3/F/93FCF1E7-E6A4-478B-96E7-D4B285925B00/vc_redist.x64.exe
X86
https://download.microsoft.com/download/9/3/F/93FCF1E7-E6A4-478B-96E7-D4B285925B00/vc_redist.x86.exe
